style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 4.20%;top: 7.94%;width: 6.60%;height: 4.40%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
例えば、
僕のテストは
変身能力を持つ
他の子達と
受けた
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 23.38%;top: 14.94%;width: 15.96%;height: 18.40%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
もちろん、全員が
単純な変身って
わけじゃない
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 43.56%;top: 0.55%;width: 25.43%;height: 11.79%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
例えば僕は
空気中の湿気で
変身してる。
空気中の水分を使い
変身したい形の
パーツを作る
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 69.10%;top: 0.63%;width: 29.04%;height: 18.16%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 3.99%;top: 38.84%;width: 9.47%;height: 2.83%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 31.76%;top: 34.04%;width: 12.34%;height: 4.72%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
当然
僕の能力
無しには
不可能だ
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 16.01%;top: 46.15%;width: 13.62%;height: 7.31%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
従って、
湿気の無い環境では
変身が難しくなる
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 46.01%;top: 30.58%;width: 25.21%;height: 12.50%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
テストでは
近場の物体から
変身後のパーツを
形成する子達も
いたな
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 72.29%;top: 35.69%;width: 23.51%;height: 12.58%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 50px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 12.07%;top: 57.78%;width: 22.66%;height: 12.03%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;font-weight: bold;

text:
エイフェン?!
どうたんだ?
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 80.69%;top: 79.40%;width: 16.49%;height: 7.00%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 86.97%;top: 86.87%;width: 8.94%;height: 1.89%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;
